sentences.en: Don't gamble on getting the job.
sentences.cn: 不要太指望得到这工作了.
不要拿你的前途去冒险.

sentences.en: Drive carefully and don't gamble with your life.
sentences.cn: 小心驾驶,别拿你的生命冒险.

sentences.en: Ellen had to admit the gamble had paid off (= succeeded ).
sentences.cn: 埃伦不得不承认这一次赌赢了。

sentences.en: I don't know if I can rely on him, but I'm willing to take a gamble.
sentences.cn: 我不知道是否能信任他, 不过我愿冒一下险.

sentences.en: It was a gamble that went badly wrong.
It was wrong to gamble with our children's future.
sentences.cn: 拿孩子们的未来冒险是错误的。

sentences.en: It's not safe to gamble on the train arriving late.
sentences.cn: 指望这次列车晚点是很不保准的.

sentences.en: Procter & Gamble is the leader in the mass market cosmetics industry.
sentences.cn: 宝洁是大众化妆品行业中的领头羊。

sentences.en: Setting up this business was a bit of a gamble.
sentences.cn: 开办这样的公司有点冒险.

sentences.en: So far it looks like Warner Brothers' gamble is paying off.
sentences.cn: 目前看来，华纳兄弟公司这一赌注下对了。

sentences.en: The operation may succeed, and it may not; it's a bit of a gamble.
sentences.cn: 这次手术没把握, 可能成功, 也可能失败.

sentences.en: Their religion forbids them to drink or gamble.
sentences.cn: 他们的宗教禁止饮酒和赌博。

sentences.en: They are not prepared to gamble their careers on this matter.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿意把自己的事业押在这件事上。

sentences.en: Yesterday, he named his cabinet and took a big gamble in the process.
sentences.cn: 昨天他冒了很大的风险任命了内阁成员。

sentences.en: You can take a gamble on getting a higher rate of interest by putting it into high - risk shares.
sentences.cn: 你可以把钱用在买风险高的股票上,以冒险来谋取暴利.

sentences.en: You can't gamble on the weather in England.
sentences.cn: 英国的天气是靠不住的.
